message: I'm proposing a fair split that slightly favors me as the first mover. If you decline, your money will be worth less next round due to your inflation.
Let's split it evenly. This way we both get the same amount, and we don't have to worry about inflation.

Due to two rounds of inflation, $4000 now is actually worth only $3200 to you. If you reject this offer, the next round will reduce your value by another 10%. This is your best opportunity to maximize your actual value.
